comment: This is her last semester at Kennesaw State, but I wanted other people to see my review just in case they search her up at another university. She is a great professor, material may be a bit difficult and tests make you think, but overall a wonderful woman and I wish her nothing but the best.

MKTG 4650 for me is an elective class and is for most students. But this class is difficult for an elective. Dr. Hutchins lectures seem to not coincide with quizzes and assignments, therefore left with questions and wrong notes. Caring professor, professional, knowledgeable, fun.... just be ready to ask a lot of questions.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Hutchins is a great professor. She is incredibly professional and knows what she is talking about. The lectures are interesting and relevant. One term-long group project (make sure you have a sold team) and a 3-essay final. Do the work and you will do fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects

comment: Professor Hutchins is a sweetheart BUT be ready for the workload.. 20 online quizzes, two semester long projects, four hw assignments, and a take home essay final exam. The lectures did not help with the final exam and she doesn't post class notes online.. a lot of work to be an elective.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Her lectures might be fun occasionally, but they're overall pointless and will not help you on your written, take-home final. She posts no rubrics or notes online, so you can't miss class. She nitpicks your grades, but an A is possible. It's just a lot of work for an elective (two group projects and written final). Very slow grader too.

Prof. Hutchins was an amazing professor and I truly enjoyed every second of class. The first half is mostly powerpoints and quizzes on connect. We did exercises with commercials - cool! halfway through the semester the group project starts. I had fun and learned a lot during this class. Do your work and you'll get an A.

Dr. Hutchins is an amazing woman. Her class is very interesting, and I truly learned alot about advertising and how to apply myself in that field. The project seems a bit intimidating at the beginning of the semester, but it really isn't that bad. It is semester long, and she gives you opportunities to make corrections. 2 essay tests, VERY doable!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Best professeor at KSU!!! Easy A!

Very disrespectful and very boring. Nothing to go off of with lectures. Group project was from seemingly arbitrary startup businesses that you have to hope responds. Expected this class to be fun, but the professor was truly awful.

First off, she's amazing, hilarious, and really cares about her students! She engages in all discussions; will call students out randomly. 3 exams essay format, 4 homework assignments (super quicksimple), 1 presentation on current events including APA essay. You're allotted 4 absences, so yes attendance is mandatory! Easy A.

Dr. Hutchins genuinely cares for her students and their success. I love the format of her class and how natural it comes to be engaged in the discussions as well. The group project provides a taste of the real world experience in the advertising world and the lectures in class is rich in content and is relevant. I highly recommend Dr. Hutchins!

My favorite class and prof of the semester. Taking her for another marketing class in the fall. She wants to help you succeed. She is very approachable and makes you feel comfortable in her classroom. The structure of her class is very well set up. She includes the class everyday. Tests are fair. Must be in class to receive notes and HW. Great clas

Hutchins is by far the BEST professor I have had @ KSU. She keeps the class interesting and loves student input. The tests are essay questions but are pretty subjective and she grades very fairly. As long as you know the concepts you are fine. 5 Homeworks that are interesting and one presentation. She is awesome! Take her whenever you can!!!!!!!!!!

Dr. Hutchins is super nice, and actually enjoys what she teaches. She constantly reminds students that she is there if we need her to be. Stay on top of the assignments. Her tests are essay format, but don't let that scare you, she wants to see how creative you are and how much you integrate the class material to your creativity.

Professor Hutchins is the best teacher I have had at KSU ever. She helps prepare you through assignments for the real world. Her tests are all short answer questions but they are open note and open book. She is always there to help and goes out of her way to show respect to students and helps them in any way possible. Absolutely amazing teacher.
